page.title: 16Old Limestone Quarry.
page.content: "Dirty Dicks" 283667 is the nickname of an old limestone quarry. It is now a pond filled with old scrap cars. It also has fish in it, such as pike and perch.It is believed to be bottomless. Some people go for a swim there,but I wouldn't as the pike bite your toes! The ground is hilly and rough.People go scrambling on motorbikes there. On the other side towards Loanhead, are gypsies.A long time ago the gypsies used to steal you and take you away. Nearby there is a clump of woods called the{Deanies.}Trees are now being taken away to make way for a dual carriageway.Once there was a dead body found in these woods in a black plastic bag. KENNY MANTLE.
